s1.name: Getting Involved
s1.p: JORAM, as an open source project, welcomes and even expects contributions.
Basically, any feature you need but you do not find implemented in JORAM may become a contribution topic. Simply send your ideas, documents and developments (if any) to the JORAM team .
You may also wish to get involved in an already undertaken work. If not already done, you may have a look at the current developments page.
